message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering inflation impacts me more severely than you (20% vs 10% per round). If we delay, we both lose value, so it's in our mutual interest to agree now.
Considering the inflation rates, I'm willing to take a bit more, but still offer you a significant share to avoid further losses. This 55-45 split seems more balanced to me.
